verses.verse: נַחֲמ֥וּ <WH5162> na-cha-Mu Comfort נַחֲמ֖וּ <WH5162> na-cha-Mu ye comfort עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> 'am-Mi; ye my people יֹאמַ֖ר <WH559> yo-Mar saith אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol The voice קוֹרֵ֔א <WH7121> ko-Re, of him that crieth בַּמִּדְבָּ֕ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness פַּנּ֖וּ <WH6437> pan-Nu Prepare דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech ye the way יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD יַשְּׁרוּ֙ <WH3474> yash-she-Ru make straight בָּעֲרָבָ֔ה <WH6160> ba-'a-ra-Vah, in the desert מְסִלָּ֖ה <WH4546> me-sil-Lah a highway לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> le-lo-Hei-nu. for our God

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every גֶּיא֙ <WH1516> gei Every valley יִנָּשֵׂ֔א <WH5375> yin-na-Se, shall be exalted וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and every הַ֥ר <WH2022> har and every mountain וְגִבְעָ֖ה <WH1389> ve-giv-'Ah and hill יִשְׁפָּ֑לוּ <WH8213> yish-Pa-lu; shall be made low וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become הֶֽעָקֹב֙ <WH6121> he-'a-Ko and the crooked לְמִישׁ֔וֹר <WH4334> le-mi-Shor, shall be made straight וְהָרְכָסִ֖ים <WH7406> ve-ha-re-cha-Sim and the rough places לְבִקְעָֽה׃ <WH1237> le-vik-'Ah. plain

Behold your God

[and] shall gently lead ס sa-Mek
